issue.title: Metadata XML generated from model use name instead of XML isocode in CLASS
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Metadata XML generated from model use name instead of XML isocode in CLASS : See #856.
Same problem for classes.


**Fixed versions :** 4.4.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Must be added in release notes, since it may cause problem on existing models.
